snippet.title: Adrenaline Expansion Pack Trailer
snippet.description:
Download this trailer to check out the jam-packed Adrenaline Expansion Pack for MotorStorm® Pacific Rift.

Prepare to take brutal off-road racing to the max with a whole host of extra goodies. Tear through three additional tracks and five track variants from MotorStorm® Pacific Rift and get behind the wheel of four previously unseen vehicles, each one supplied with three killer liveries. 

Choose from six bonus characters, each with three unique costumes  and liven up your favourite vehicles with a massive selection of eye-popping paintjobs. 

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item's use restrictions.  If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item.  One time fee for downloads on up to five activated systems.

Video Output in HD requires cables and an HD compatible display, both sold separately.  This video will play on displays ranging from standard definition to 1080p.  However, this video will output at a maximum resolution of 720p.

MotorStorm is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. © 2008 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Evolution Studios Ltd.
